styles.name: Photorealistic
styles.promptHint: Use lifelike lighting, physically plausible materials, realistic textures, and natural depth with minimal stylization

styles.name: Cinematic Lighting
styles.promptHint: Use directional key lighting, deep shadow contrast, atmospheric haze, and dramatic framing for film-like visual tension

styles.name: Minimalist
styles.promptHint: Prioritize whitespace, strict element reduction, clean alignment, and restrained accents to keep hierarchy crisp and uncluttered

styles.name: Flat Design
styles.promptHint: Use crisp 2D geometry, solid fills, clear icon forms, and high legibility without heavy gradients or texture noise

styles.name: Isometric
styles.promptHint: Construct visuals in consistent isometric perspective with modular blocks, clear depth cues, and orderly spatial structure

styles.name: 3D Render / C4D Style
styles.promptHint: Use polished 3D forms, smooth reflections, soft global illumination, and depth-rich composition with a modern tech finish

styles.name: Memphis Design
styles.promptHint: Use bold geometric motifs, asymmetrical rhythm, playful pattern layering, and high-contrast accents with controlled balance

styles.name: Cyberpunk
styles.promptHint: Use high-contrast neon accents, dark atmospheric layers, reflective surfaces, and dense futuristic visual detail

styles.name: Line Art
styles.promptHint: Use precise line hierarchy, simplified contours, limited fills, and consistent stroke logic for clean structural clarity

styles.name: Synthwave
styles.promptHint: Use retro-futuristic gradients, geometric grids, analog glow, and horizon-driven depth with nostalgic digital aesthetics

styles.name: Pixel Art
styles.promptHint: Use intentional pixel geometry, low-resolution edge treatment, limited palette blocks, and grid-locked composition

styles.name: Risograph
styles.promptHint: Use offset color layers, halftone grain, print misregistration texture, and limited-ink contrast for analog print character

styles.name: Bauhaus
styles.promptHint: Use primary geometric primitives, disciplined proportion, strong typographic hierarchy, and function-first visual balance

styles.name: Low Poly
styles.promptHint: Use faceted polygon planes, angular shading transitions, simplified volume, and clean triangulated structure

styles.name: Watercolor
styles.promptHint: Use soft pigment diffusion, transparent layering, irregular edges, and gentle tonal blending with organic flow

styles.name: Oil Painting
styles.promptHint: Use rich brushstroke texture, layered pigment depth, subtle impasto feel, and classical light-volume modeling

styles.name: Ukiyo-e
styles.promptHint: Use flat color planes, stylized contour lines, decorative pattern rhythm, and woodblock-inspired compositional balance

styles.name: Pop Art
styles.promptHint: Use saturated contrast, bold outlines, graphic repetition, and comic halftone energy with punchy visual impact

styles.name: Paper Cutout
styles.promptHint: Use stacked paper-like layers, soft cast shadows, cut-edge silhouettes, and tactile depth through layered planes

styles.name: Charcoal Sketch
styles.promptHint: Use expressive charcoal strokes, tonal smudging, rough edge definition, and draft-like conceptual composition
